original_text: There was not a city that made peace with the people of Israel except the Hivites, the inhabitants of Gibeon. They took them all in battle.
korean_text: 기브온 주민 히위 족속 외에는 이스라엘 자손과 화친한 성읍이 하나도 없고 이스라엘 자손이 싸워서 다 점령하였으니

sentences.original_text: There was not a city that made peace with the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성과 화평을 맺은 도시는 없었다

sentences.original_text: They took them all in battle
